text: Bumped into Kevin, who was meeting w/ Surj yesterday. He seems in good spirits. Looking forward to my chat with him on Friday.

Also of note I met the mayor of Scappoose on Saturday after a talk I gave - he wanted to discuss the advanced mfg center they’re working up there w/ Boeing. (I had already met w/ Gregg Meyer of PSU who is collaborating with him on this). Could be an interesting source of candidates, students, projects, or money.
He’s much more than that but yes. :slightly_smiling_face:
